I'm not seeing a problem when I do a search using Firefox on XP. A couple of questions:

Which locale are you using on your system?
What result do you see if you search from the help view?

To search from the help view 
Help->Dynamic Help
Click on the Search Tab
One more question - do you know if this is a regression since 3.3M5?

>One more question - do you know if this is a regression since 3.3M5?
It works on M5 but not M6 and todays I-build.

>Which locale are you using on your system?
CH_DE but it works on my colleague's computer with same locale.

>What result do you see if you search from the help view?
This works fine.

One more question, can you reproduce this when using a clean workspace? Also can you try from Mozilla to do a Tools/Clear Private Data. I suspect that the reason it fails on your system and not your colleagues is stale data, either in the form of cached jsps or workspace data.

>One more question, can you reproduce this when using a clean workspace? 
Yes.

>Tools/Clear Private Data
I don't have that menu item. I cleared the cache but that didn't help.

NOTE: it perfectly works using 3.3 M5.

I think that there is a good possibility that this is a duplicate of Bug 182466, which I just applied a patch for yesterday. The line number in your error log is in the same area where a null poiinter check was added. Can you pick up I20070417-0800 or later to see if this fixes your problem?

Works like a charm now.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 182466 ***
